item.title: Next event
item.description:
Next event

Hot on the heels of handing over the controls to Critical Music to give our new VOID soundsystem a proper work out, we bring you something a little different. Dancefloor favourites Annix, the duo made up of Konichi & Decimal Bass, will be joined on the one’s and two's by special guest TI to launch their album “Forever”. This will sell out, don't sleep on the half price early birds.

item.title: NEWSFLASH: Dub Phizix Has Recorded FABRICLIVE 84 - fabric blog
item.description:
NEWSFLASH: Dub Phizix Has Recorded FABRICLIVE 84 - fabric blog

His music, described by Mixmag as 'essential material', has an irreverent edge, yet is deadly serious in its dancefloor approach, reflecting the character of the Manchester producer, born George Ovens.

item.title: Annix - Warriors (ft. Killa P)
item.description:
Annix - Warriors (ft. Killa P)

Annix continues their spree of ridiculous tunes from their upcoming Forever LP with "Warriors" featuring the grime don Killa P on the vocals. Ridiculous!

item.title: Some Crash Bandicoot Inspired Drum & Bass from Annix
item.description:
Some Crash Bandicoot Inspired Drum & Bass from Annix

Cheltenham, UK based drum & bass duo, Annix, are planning a new full length release with legendary imprint, Playaz. The upcoming album is called Forever, and one of our first glimpses of the release is a track called "Crash", which gives us an innovative groove inspired by the Crash Ba
